subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States is the best candidate to host the 2022 World Cup of soccer. But that may not be enough to win the bid when FIFA selects hosts for 2018 and ’22 in Zurich on Thursday.
snippet: The United States is the best candidate to host the 2022 World Cup of soccer. But that may not be enough to win the bid when FIFA selects hosts for 2018 and ’22 in Zurich on Thursday.
